name: Red Graphic
tag_list: interactive-agency, advertising, promo-site, banner, rich-media, online-game, web-application, web-development, branding, web-design, content-development, project-support, project-update
overview:
Red Graphic is an interactive agency that creates promotional projects on the Internet. The company has been in the advertising business since 1992 and on the Internet since 1998. It serves clients from Belarus, France, the Netherlands, Russia, Ukraine, and the USA.

Red Graphic maintains its focus on interactive advertising. The company has built a diversified portfolio of skills intended to address different customer needs: online marketing audit, online strategy development, creative concepts for advertising campaigns, design and animation, promotional websites and banners, online games, and interactive services.

Red Graphic is an acknowledged expert in web development. It provides a complete range of services in web development consulting, development of project vision, designing and prototyping, web design, interface development, content development, project support and moderation, project promotion, and efficiency improvement.
